entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
